imageRef.description: ImageRef is the reference to the OCI artifact to pull. Supports both tag format 'registry/repository:tag' and digest format 'registry/repository@sha256:digest'.

outPath.description: OutPath is the path to the destination file where the extracted artifact will be saved.

allowOverwrite.description: Whether to allow overwriting an existing file at the specified path. If false and the file exists, the download will fail.

mediaType.description: MediaType of the layer to pull. Selects the first layer matching this type. If not specified, it selects the first layer available.

insecureSkipTLSVerify.description: Whether to skip TLS verification when pulling the artifact. Defaults to false.
